abstract: Banco Santander, the biggest lender in Spain and one of the largest in the euro zone, said Wednesday that net profit for the third quarter had held steady with a year ago, up just 0.7 percent, as the bank’s operations abroad protected it against the bad loans dragging down the Spanish economy.
snippet: Banco Santander, the biggest lender in Spain and one of the largest in the euro zone, said Wednesday that net profit for the third quarter had held steady with a year ago, up just 0.7 percent, as the bank’s operations abroad protected it against t...
lead_paragraph: Banco Santander, the biggest lender in Spain and one of the largest in the euro zone, said Wednesday that net profit for the third quarter had held steady with a year ago, up about 0.7 percent, as the bank’s operations abroad protected it against the sluggish Spanish economy.

headline.main: Santander’s Steady Profits Fight Off Spanish Slump

abstract: Verizon Wireless took the wraps off the Motorola Droid smartphone. The device is an effort by both companies to woo customers considering the Apple iPhone, which is only available on AT&T.
snippet: Verizon Wireless took the wraps off the Motorola Droid smartphone. The device is an effort by both companies to woo customers considering the Apple iPhone, which is only available on AT&T.
lead_paragraph: If you haven’t heard of the Droid, you will.
